name: client-home.toml

description.summary: Client home screen with quick order and status tracking

rawContent:
# Client Home Route
# Main screen of the client app

[route]
id = "client-home"
path = "/prototype/client"
title = "ElderCare"

[page]
type = "public"
role = "client"

[page.description]
summary = "Client home screen with quick order and status tracking"
features = [
  "New order button",
  "Track existing order by phone",
  "Service types overview"
]

[relations]
guards = ["public"]
roles = ["client"]
platforms = ["client-app"]
useCases = ["create-order", "track-order"]
components = ["order-card", "service-card"]

[implementation]
component = "ClientHome"
file = "src/prototype/pages/client/ClientHome.tsx"
status = "implemented"
